channel.title: Herald-Tribune (Custom RSS - Broad Article Grab)
channel.description: A personal RSS feed with broader article scraping from heraldtribune.com

item.title: Walking the rightsizing walk. Here's why I decided to sell the house
item.description: I should know by now, if you venture into an exploratory hypothetical conversation with a real estate broker, you might as well start packing. One casual conversation with a broker friend started the house hurricane.

item.title: When does the Starbucks, Dunkin' Donuts 2025 fall menu come out?
item.description: While it might be another few months until we actually feel the fall weather, it's less than two weeks until we starttastingit.

item.title: Watch St. Thomas Aquinas vs. Cardinal Mooney live on NFHS Network
item.description: St. Thomas Aquinas and Cardinal Mooney enter the season with state championship aspirations and will waste no time testing their mettle by kicking off preseason action against one another. The Cougars, who fell just short of their second state championship in as many years, will travel to a Raiders program looking to bring home their seventh-straight state championship.

item.title: Vote for best 2025 high school football team in Manatee, Sarasota area
item.description: High school football teams are getting ready to take the field for the first time in the 2025 season on Friday, Aug. 15.

item.title: Going to Florida theme parks during Hurricane Season…
item.description: Will Florida see its first 2025 direct hit from a hurricane this weekend? It's looking less and less likely.

item.title: Ivanka Trump's martial arts training may help UFC fight…
item.description: Of all the members in President Donald Trump's inner circle, there's only one who likely understands what happens in a mixed martial arts fight.

item.title: First woman to win the Florida Python Challenge takes…
item.description: For the first time, a woman won the Florida Python Challenge in July and collected her $10,000 reward this week.

item.title: FDOT to close Clark Rd./Honore Ave. intersection for…
item.description: The Florida Department of Transportation will close the intersection of Clark Road and Honore Avenue from 7:30 p.m. Thursday, Aug. 14 until 6 a.m. the next morning.

item.title: Sarasota-Bradenton forecast: Low risk from Tropical…
item.description: AsTropical Storm Erin churns through the Atlantic, forecasters say Sarasota-Bradenton is in the clear – for now.

item.title: Trial underway for Sarasota mother accused of killing 14-week-old baby
item.description: Lily Scheip wiped away tears as she sat at the defendant’s table in a courtroom in the downtown Sarasota judicial center Tuesday, Aug. 13, listening to opening statements by the prosecution.

item.title: Selby Gardens plan puts Sarasota tree population at risk
item.description: In her book “Bird by Bird; Some Instructions on Writing and Life,” authorAnne Lamottspoke of her practice of creating a “(Expletive) First Draft” in order to get the creative juices flowing.
